mapper.insert: insert into ecs_comment (comment_id, comment_type, title, id_value, email, user_name, comment_rank, add_time, ip_address, status, parent_id, user_id, rec_id, comment_tag, buy_time, good_num, hide_username, order_id, content) values (#{commentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{commentType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idValue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commentRank,jdbcType=BIT}, #{addTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ipAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{recId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{commentTag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buyTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hideUsername,jdbcType=BIT}, #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ecs_comment set comment_type = #{commentType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_value = #{idValue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comment_rank = #{commentRank,jdbcType=BIT}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ip_address = #{ipAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rec_id = #{recId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, comment_tag = #{commentTag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, buy_time = #{buyTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, good_num = #{goodNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, hide_username = #{hideUsername,jdbcType=BIT}, order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where comment_id = #{commentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select comment_id, comment_type, title, id_value, email, user_name, comment_rank, add_time, ip_address, status, parent_id, user_id, rec_id, comment_tag, buy_time, good_num, hide_username, order_id, content from ecs_comment where comment_id = #{commentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select comment_id, comment_type, title, id_value, email, user_name, comment_rank, add_time, ip_address, status, parent_id, user_id, rec_id, comment_tag, buy_time, good_num, hide_username, order_id, content from ecs_comment
